summary: This is a subpoena from the Epstein case to JP Morgan Chase Bank, requesting extensive financial records for Jeffrey Epstein and his associated entities from inception to present. It demands account documents, transaction records, identification, wire transfers, and correspondence related to Epstein's financial activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subpoena requests all financial records for Jeffrey Epstein and his associated entities from JP Morgan Chase Bank, indicating he is the central subject of the investigation.

locations: Indianapolis, Indiana 46231-1335 (JP Morgan Chase processing center)
keyFacts: A comprehensive subpoena was issued to JP Morgan Chase Bank for all financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein and his entities.
The subpoena demands records from account inception to present, including transaction details, identification documents, wire transfers, and correspondence.
The request includes electronic banking information such as IP addresses, MAC addresses, and online session data.
The document indicates a forensic financial investigation into Epstein's banking activities and transactions.
